name: Klefki
description: The Key Ring Pokémon. These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon can move to the top of initiative order in a single round, but must use a status-affecting move on its turn.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.description: If not already holding an item, this Pokémon steals the held item of any Pokémon it hits with a melee attack.
